compressedcreativity.ponder.rotational_c: Generating Pressure using a Rotational Compressor
The Rotational Compressor is used to generate pressure
Specific Rotational Direction needed in order for Compressor to work.
Air will leak from unconnected sides of tubes or some machines!
Don't let pressure built up in the machines.
compressedcreativity.ponder.air_blower.t: Air Blower uses pressurized air to create Air Current
Air Current speed, as well as air consumption rate, depends on current Air Pressure
compressedcreativity.ponder.pressure_tie: PneumaticCraft: Repressurized has three Pressure Tiers for pneumatic machines:
Tier 1 machines are capable of nominally resisting 5 bar of pressure
Tier 1.5 machines can resist up to 10 bar
Tier 2 machines can resist up to 10 bar
Note that bar in PNC:R represents the pressure above atmospheric pressure, so 0 bar is unpressurized air, and -1 bar is a vacuum.
